title: samayamidE dayai sei
sahitya:
samayamidE dayai seyyavE sarva jIva kAruNya nalla


anupallavi

  umaiyanri vERu tuNai enakkEDu uDal uyir nIrE dhiDan enak-kOdum


caraNam    alaivAyil tumbu alaindADum vaNNam nilai onruminri ninaindODum eNNam
malaiyAmal nirkka magizhAga paNNum talaivA nin sonda maganE eNNam
